channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description: 1. how do i make myself an admin so i can have to gold crown and kick people? 2. how do i add and delete comands from my source, what file do i edit ? ohh and btw im using project 16 v4.5 ;D

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Ok, for the first question: To make yourself admin, go into the folder ‘data’ (there’s a folder named data in Project 16 v6, so I’m assuming it’s the same in older versions) and edit the administrators.txt file. Put one name on each line for each admin you want. Same can be done in moderators.txt to make silver crown mods.

For the commands, they are found in the file client.java.
Basically, commands have this format:

if (command.startsWith("commandhere") && playerRights >=1) { REST HERE }
OR

else if (command.startsWith("commandhere") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("namehere")) { REST HERE }

So basically press Ctrl + F and search for command.startswith - this will take you to the commands one at a time, and you can edit them to your choosing.

Read full topic
